categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: A kdak was an ancient creature of Arda-2 that had a huge slug-like body, a mouth surrounded by cilia-like feelers that could grab objects, a beak, nine eyes, and a strange-smelling slime trail.

Speculation emerged during the reign of the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances among experts that the Kdak were descendant from the ancient soulworm; the inspiration for a variety of deities and horrors across numerous galactic civilizations. These historians believed there the Soulworm was the common ancestor of the Kdak, Silan, and the Leviathans.
